sentence.Network_en: These cameras have increased only marginally in value over the past decade.
sentence.Network_cn: 在过去10年里，这些照相机的价格只是略有提高。

sentence.Network_en: Sales last year were marginally higher than in 1991.
sentence.Network_cn: 去年的销售额比1991年略有增加。

sentence.Network_en: The Christian Democrats did marginally worse than expected.
sentence.Network_cn: 基督教民主党人的表现比预期稍有逊色。

entry.def: Marginally means to only a small extent.

example.ex: Sales last year were marginally higher than in 1991...
example.tran: 去年的销售额比1991年略有增加。

example.ex: The Christian Democrats did marginally worse than expected...
example.tran: 基督教民主党人的表现比预期稍有逊色。

sentences.en: This year’s profits were marginally higher than last year’s.
sentences.cn: 今年的利润比去年稍微高些。
